review: I love my new Fire Tv!  I had cut the satellite last November & went old school over-the-air, but missed some of my old channels.  I signed up with Sling TV & used the $50 coupon to buy a Fire TV.  The voice app works great!  Between Amazon Prime, Netflix & Hulu Plus, I can watch just about any show I want & I'm saving about $60-$65 a month over satellite!  BTW, if you can read, you can set up Fire TV by yourself.  I'm not great with technology, but it was very simple even for me!

author: Loretta

review: Ok.  I have spent about a month with Fire TV.  We cancelled our cable once they started charging for data over 300 GB.  Now we only have internet and are using over the air antenna, netflix, sling tv, and prime to make up the difference.  We have not looked back.  I love the quick response from Fire TV.  The voice search is nice.  It can be a little hit and miss as it will not or seems to not open apps.  The games are actually fun.  It is so much like a mini game system, that I am considering purchasing the optional game controller.  The remote is small, simple, and well designed.  If you do not have Amazon Prime, get it.  It is as good as Netflix and you get FREE SHIPPING folks.

author: Tony

review: When I got this I knew I was going to love it.  I gave my Roku 3 to my Mom.I should have waited.  First I took off 1 star because it will not play Hulu Plus correctly.  It will be playing just fine, then the video freezes but the sound keeps playing. Does this many times during a show.  I pause it then reload Hulu, then it will play for a few minutes then same thing again.I have cleared data, uninstalled reinstalled, many times.  No luck.  I don't know if this is a Amazon Fire TV problem or a Hulu Plus app problem.  Either way both should be getting it fixed.  I am ready to send back the Fire TV and cancel Hulu Plus.  Looking at other reviews this is a problem many have been having for a long time. It should be fixed by now.I took off the other star because of the remote.  It is made to fit a 4-year-olds hands.  The button layout is crazy and too close together.
